DOC.brief_title: Internet Intervention Adolescents With Chronic Pain
DOC.detailed_description: An estimate 15 % 30 % otherwise healthy child adolescent suffer recurrent chronic pain headache , abdominal pain , musculoskeletal pain . Chronic pain significant impact child 's mood , daily functioning , overall quality life . Effective behavioral intervention develop increase positive cop behavior . However , child access intervention due variety barrier distance pediatric pain treatment center . We develop online behavioral intervention call Web-based Management Adolescent Pain ( Web-MAP ) , preliminary finding indicate child family receive intervention experience significant improvement pain level daily functioning compare child receive intervention ( Palermo et al. , 2009 ) . The purpose study extend finding : 1 ) recruiting family medical center , 2 ) determine whether benefit online behavioral intervention maintain 6- 12-months intervention complete , 3 ) evaluate additional outcome parent response pain child sleep quality , anxiety , depression , health service use , 4 ) compare result online behavioral intervention online patient education .
